TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DrawingContext extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class DrawingContext Inherits DispatcherObject Implements IDisposable
public ref class DrawingContext abstract : System::Windows::Threading::DispatcherObject, IDisposable

summary.span: 使用 draw、push 和 pop 命令描述視覺內容。

span.span: Describes visual content using draw, push, and pop commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用填入或的視覺內容。Use a to populate a or a with visual content. 雖然繪製方法看起來類似的繪製方法類型，它們的功能非常不同：是保留的模式的圖形系統搭配使用，而類型搭配即時模式圖形系統。Although the draw methods appear similar to the draw methods of the type, they function very differently: is used with a retained mode graphics system, while the type is used with an immediate mode graphics system. 當您使用物件的繪製命令中，您實際上儲存一組轉譯指令 (雖然正確儲存機制而定，提供物件的類型)，將稍後使用的圖形系統，;不會繪製在即時的畫面。When you use a object's draw commands, you are actually storing a set of rendering instructions (although the exact storage mechanism depends on the type of object that supplies the ) that will later be used by the graphics system; you are not drawing to the screen in real-time. 如需有關 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 圖形系統的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 圖形呈現概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/wpf-graphics-rendering-overview.md)。For more information about how the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) graphics system works, see [WPF Graphics Rendering Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/wpf-graphics-rendering-overview.md). 您永遠不會直接具現化; 可以不過，購買繪圖內容從特定方法，例如和。You never directly instantiate a ; you can, however, acquire a drawing context from certain methods, such as and . ## Examples 下列範例會擷取從並用來繪製矩形。The following example retrieves a from a and uses it to draw a rectangle. [!code-csharp[drawingvisualsample#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#101)] [!code-vb[drawingvisualsample#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#101)] 下一個範例示範， ，和命令。The next example demonstrates the , , and commands. 取自及使用顯示控制項。The is obtained from a and displayed using an control. [!code-csharp[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PushEffectExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/CSharp/PushEffectExample.cs#pusheffectexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PushEffectExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/visualbasic/pusheffectexample.vb#pusheffectexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Close ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub Close ()
public: abstract void Close();

summary.span: 關閉 ，然後清除內容。

span.span: Closes the and flushes the content.

summary.span: 此後便就無法再修改 。

span.span: Afterward, the cannot be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A必須先關閉然後可以轉譯其內容，但它已關閉之後，無法修改。A must be closed before its content can be rendered, but after it has been closed, it cannot be modified. 這個呼叫不需要所有的推播呼叫已迅速。This call does not require all Push calls to have been Popped.

exception.span: 這個物件已經關閉或遭處置。

span.span: This object has already been closed or disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract void DisposeCore ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void DisposeCore() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub DisposeCore ()
protected: abstract void DisposeCore();

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請勿直接從程式碼; 呼叫此方法使用方法改為。Do not call this method directly from your code; use the method instead.

exception.span: 物件已經關閉或遭處置。

span.span: The object has already been closed or disposed.

param.name: brush
param.span: 用來填滿橢圓形的筆刷。

span.span: The brush with which to fill the ellipse.

param.span: 這是選擇項，可以是 。

span.span: This is optional, and can be .

param.span: 如果筆刷為 ，則不會繪製填滿。

span.span: If the brush is , no fill is drawn.

param.name: pen
param.span: 用來將橢圓形描邊的畫筆。

span.span: The pen with which to stroke the ellipse.

param.span: 這是選擇項，可以是 。

span.span: This is optional, and can be .

param.span: 如果畫筆為 ，則不會繪製任何筆劃。

span.span: If the pen is , no stroke is drawn.

param.name: center
param.span: 橢圓形的中心位置。

span.span: The location of the center of the ellipse.

param.name: radiusX
param.span: 橢圓形的水平半徑。

span.span: The horizontal radius of the ellipse.

param.name: radiusY
param.span: 橢圓形的垂直半徑。

span.span: The vertical radius of the ellipse.

summary.span: 利用指定的 和 繪製橢圓形。

span.span: Draws an ellipse with the specified and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 筆刷與畫筆可以是`null`。The brush and the pen can both be `null`. 如果筆刷為`null`，就會進行任何填滿。If the brush is `null`, then no fill is performed. 如果畫筆位於`null`，則會不執行任何筆劃。If the pen is `null`, then no stoke is performed. 如果畫筆和筆刷`null`，則看不到繪圖。If both the pen and the brush are `null`, then the drawing is not visible.

param.span: 圓角的 Y 維度半徑。

span.span: The radius in the Y dimension of the rounded corners.

param.span: 這個值會限制在介於 0 到 /2 之間的值。

span.span: This value will be clamped to a value between 0 to /2.

summary.span: 利用指定的 和 繪製圓角矩形。

span.span: Draws a rounded rectangle with the specified and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 筆刷與畫筆可以是`null`。The brush and the pen can both be `null`. 如果筆刷為`null`，就會進行任何填滿。If the brush is `null`, then no fill is performed. 如果畫筆位於`null`，則會不執行任何筆劃。If the pen is `null`, then no stoke is performed. 如果畫筆和筆刷`null`，則看不到繪圖。If both the pen and the brush are `null`, then the drawing is not visible.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void DrawVideo (System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer player, System.Windows.Rect rectangle);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DrawVideo(class System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer player, valuetype System.Windows.Rect rectangle) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub DrawVideo (player As MediaPlayer, rectangle As Rect)
public: abstract void DrawVideo(System::Windows::Media::MediaPlayer ^ player, System::Windows::Rect rectangle);

param.name: player
param.span: 要繪製的媒體。

span.span: The media to draw.

param.name: rectangle
param.span: 要在其中繪製 player 的區域。

span.span: The region in which to draw player.

summary.span: 將視訊繪製至指定的區域。

span.span: Draws a video into the specified region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，將延伸媒體放入矩形參數所定義的區域。Note that the media will be stretched to fit inside the area defined by the rectangle parameter. 如果矩形及媒體有不同的外觀比例時，會發生扭曲程度。If rectangle and media have different aspect ratios, distortion will occur. 如需更多控制如何媒體用來填滿區域的詳細資訊，請使用命令來繪製矩形，並填入它與包含媒體。For more control over how media is used to fill an area, use the command to draw a rectangle and fill it with a that contains media.

permission.span: 若要顯示您不需要的媒體或存取。

span.span: to display media that you do not have or access for.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Pop ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Pop() cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub Pop ()
public: abstract void Pop();

summary.span: 取出已推入至繪製內容的最後一個不透明遮罩、不透明度、裁剪、效果或轉換作業。

span.span: Pops the last opacity mask, opacity, clip, effect, or transform operation that was pushed onto the drawing context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一旦作業在取出，它不再套用至後續繪製命令。Once an operation is popped, it is no longer applied to subsequent drawing commands. ## Examples 下列範例顯示的效果命令。The following example shows the effect of the command. [!code-csharp[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PopExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/CSharp/PopExample.cs#popexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PopExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/visualbasic/popexample.vb#popexamplewholepage)] 下圖顯示此範例的輸出：The following illustration shows this example's output: ![以不同的不透明度值繪製的矩形](~/add/media/graphicsmm-drawingcontextpopexample.gif "以不同的不透明度值繪製的矩形")![Rectangles drawn with different opacity values](~/add/media/graphicsmm-drawingcontextpopexample.gif "Rectangles drawn with different opacity values")

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void PushClip (System.Windows.Media.Geometry clipGeometry);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PushClip(class System.Windows.Media.Geometry clipGeometry) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub PushClip (clipGeometry As Geometry)
public: abstract void PushClip(System::Windows::Media::Geometry ^ clipGeometry);

param.name: clipGeometry
param.span: 要套用至後續繪製命令的裁剪區域。

span.span: The clip region to apply to subsequent drawing commands.

summary.span: 將指定的裁剪區域推入至繪製內容。

span.span: Pushes the specified clip region onto the drawing context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 裁剪區域會套用到所有後續的繪製命令，直到將其從移除命令。The clip region applies to all subsequent drawing commands until it is removed by the command.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void PushOpacityMask (System.Windows.Media.Brush opacityMask);

Public MustOverride Sub PushOpacityMask (opacityMask As Brush)

param.name: opacityMask

summary.span: 將指定的不透明遮罩推入至繪製內容。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 遮罩套用至所有後續的繪製命令之前將其從移除作業。The mask is applied to all subsequent drawing commands until it is removed by the operation. 如需建立不透明度遮罩的詳細資訊，請參閱[不透明度遮罩概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md)。For more information about creating opacity masks, see [Opacity Masks Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md).
